events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized under Refund due to customer's request for money back on incorrect shipment.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the incorrect product delivery reported.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to proceed with the refund?
Order number is 45321, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and provide instructions for returning the wrong item.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the refund process being started so fast.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and you will receive the amount in 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure your refund was received and if you need additional assistance, please let us know.
Since your refund was confirmed received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now.
